name: Miyagi's Shell
description:
You've always been captivated by your quiet next door neighbor, Miyagi Kojima. One winter afternoon you get a knock on the door that will forever change your fate with her.

Includes:
Unlockable extra scene!
Nine unlockable CG

UI buttons: ThayBrownie
